info.title: Restaurant Store API
info.description: REST API for Restaurant Store Backend - A comprehensive ordering system for restaurant management with customer authentication, menu browsing, cart management, order processing, payment integration, and delivery tracking.

tags.name: Products & Categories
tags.description: Endpoints for browsing menu, categories, and products

tags.name: Web Payment
tags.description: Web payment endpoints that support both Payment Intent and Payment Session

put.description: Updates the quantity of an item in the cart

delete.description: Removes a specific item from the shopping cart

post.description: Creates a payment for an order. Returns Payment Intent (custom UI) or Payment Session (Stripe hosted) based on configuration.
Creates a new order from the current user's cart items

400.description: Invalid order data or empty cart

post.description: Creates a Stripe payment intent for order payment
Processes payment for an order (supports Stripe, Cash, Credit/Debit card)
Adds a product to the shopping cart with specified quantity
Creates a new customer account with email, password, name, phone, and address
Authenticates a customer and returns a JWT token

get.description: Retrieves all products with optional filtering by category and availability

parameters.name: availableOnly
parameters.description: Filter to show only available products

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific product
Retrieves pickup window and instructions for a pickup order

400.description: Order is not a pickup order

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific order
Retrieves the current status of an order
Retrieves all orders for the currently authenticated user
Retrieves all orders for a specific customer
Retrieves all product categories available in the menu
Retrieves all products belonging to a specific category
Retrieves the current user's shopping cart with all items

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

delete.description: Removes all items from the shopping cart

productId.description: ID of the product to add

quantity.description: Quantity of the product to add

AddToCartRequest.description: Request to add a product to the shopping cart

address.example: 123 Main St, Apt 4B, New York, NY 10001

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token obtained from login endpoint
